description: Data extracted from the Bureau of Land's Site Remediation Program Database which identifies the terms and conditions of all "No Further Remediation " (NFR) Letters issued for all voluntary remediation projects administered through the Pre-Notice Site Cleanup Program (1989 to 1995) and the Site Remediation Program (1996 to the present).

name: IEPA No Further Remediation Sites
